title: Bloomberg Markets: Wealth Management Industry Hit by Lower Fees
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Wealth Management Industry Hit by Lower Fees
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Margaret Collins Investing Team Leader Bloomberg Editorial Discussing wealth managers/financial advisers are losing revenue as fees drop and having trouble attracting younger clients.
